price: ߖߊ߲߬ߓߌߟߊ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߞߏߢߊ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߌ߬ ߞߋߟߊ߫ ߘߐߜߍ ߣߊ߭ ߞߐ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬؟
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
